title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.28 - Medicare supplement insurance reporting form and refund calculation form
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 52.28 - Medicare supplement insurance reporting form and refund calculation form

State Regulations

The data required by section
52.44
(c) of this Part shall be submitted to the superintendent in the following form: (a) Medicare supplement refund calculation form. Image

Image
(b) Reporting form for the calculation of benchmark ratio since inception for group policies or certificates delivered or issued for delivery in New York State. Image
(c) Reporting form for the calculation of benchmark ratio since inception for individual policies delivered or issued for delivery in New York State. Image

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
52.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
